trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Regina
There were no other sightings in Regina on or around July 11th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Flash of light spontaneously appears shortly after looking out the window.
divs: sighting detailsi was in the front right passenger seat of a car travelling at approximately 100 km\h. at the time we were heading south on the road where the ufo sighting occurred. it was nighttime at exactly 22:40 -06:00 cst when i spontaneously have a look out the window toward the clear sky. a second later a flash of bright white light appeared. this synchronized 'phenomena' has happened to me before and i do not consider it to be a coincidence any more. i said out loud, "wow, that's incredible." and the driver (my dad) said, "what is?". i shrugged my shoulders and said it was just a shooting star. i didn't say it was a ufo that happens to "appear" and "approach" me from time to time. it's a subject that i'd prefer not to talk about to family members and friends all the time, despite the frequent 'visits' of ufos. every time i'm visited by these ufos, i get a sense of relief and joy. although, some time after such events, i'm reminded not to be so naive, as to think i am summoning or have a guardian for that matter. i must remember my intuition and remain in the balance by keeping myself aware of technological, scientific, psychological, military and intelligence community capabilities. note: - the light appeared stationary and above the city. however, it is possible it was just outside city limits, as that was where we were heading. - the sighting reminded me of my visit to a job fair. i remarked to a city air port radar operator, "how about those ufos?". he laughingly replied, "too much paperwork." and his supervisor looked caught off guard. sincerely
